main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.database.Database
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SQLDB

    public abstract class Database
extends Object
    Abstract class representing a Database.

    All methods should be only called from an asynchronous thread, unless stated otherwise.

    Author:
    Rsl1122

      • init

        public void init()
          throws DatabaseInitException
        Initiates the database.
        Throws:
        DatabaseInitException - if SQLException or other exception occurs.

      • wasSeenBefore

        public abstract boolean wasSeenBefore(UUID uuid)
        Check if the user is saved in the database.
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of the user.
        Returns:
        true/false

      • getName

        public abstract String getName()
        Used to get the name of the database type.

        Thread safe.

        Returns:
        SQLite/MySQL

      • getConfigName

        public String getConfigName()
        Used to get the config name of the database type.

        Thread safe.

        Returns:
        sqlite/mysql

      • isNewDatabase

        public abstract boolean isNewDatabase()
                               throws SQLException
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getVersion

        public abstract int getVersion()
                        throws SQLException
        Used to get the database schema version.
        Returns:
        Integer starting from 0, incremented by one when schema is updated.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • setVersion

        public abstract void setVersion(int version)
                         throws SQLException
        Used to set the database schema version.
        Parameters:
        version - Integer starting from 0, incremented by one when schema is updated.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • close

        public abstract void close()
                    throws SQLException
        Closes the database and it's resources.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • removeAccount

        public abstract void removeAccount(UUID uuid)
                            throws SQLException
        Removes all data related to an account from the database.
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of the account.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • removeAllData

        public abstract void removeAllData()
                            throws SQLException
        Used to clear all data from the database.

        Uses DELETE * FROM table.

        Throws:
        SQLException - if remove fails.

        Throws:

        Used to get the Command usage mep.
        Returns:
